channel.title: How do i change the sprites on my server?
channel.description:
How do i change the sprites on my server like the tab icons and mod crowns? Oh also if i can't (on xlinescape) can someone p[lease send me the link to download project x source
ty for your help [br][size=1]Posted on: June 14, 2007, 03:00:52 AM[/size][hr]Cmon... Someone has to know..

item.title: How do i change the sprites on my server?
item.dc:creator: @nikk nikk
item.description:
@nikk wrote:

Okay. Still need to know how
[/quote] if you wanna make ppl mod,admin. go to character files>select name>look for character rights>change from 0 to: 1>mod, 2>admin, 3>owner[/quote]I know that, I need to know how to make the icons like stats and magebook different.
Not change player rights…
